remarks: Subspace sum of a closed subspace and an atom.  ( ~ pmapjat1 analog.) TODO: merge into ~ dihjat1 ?  (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-2014.)
statement:
dihjat1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihjat1.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjat1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dihjat1.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihjat1.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
dihjat1.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjat1.j $e |- .\/ = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjat1.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihjat1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ran I ) $.
dihjat1.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dihjat1lem.q $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
dihjat1lem $p |- ( ph -> ( X .\/ ( N ` { T } ) ) = ( X .(+) ( N ` { T } ) ) ) $.
